trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ramona
There were no other sightings in Ramona on or around December 28th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO circled and shone spotlight on my parked car when overhead
divs: sighting details1. driving from the 67 to san vicente rd at 10:30pm 2. noticed lights at 67\dye rd intersection. 3. at first i believed them to be a plane, but as i drove closer i realized that the lights were circling. 4. object was triangular with one red and one green light in the rear and one white light\spotlight in the front. it circled over a farming area multiple times while i was driving through the area. the object was completely silent and after i stopped my car to watch it further, as it passed above me it shone its spotlight at my car. 5. i felt very scared and called my boyfriend and had him talk to me while parked and as i was driving home. he recorded our phone conversation as i was describing what i saw. 6. i was frightened after the light shone into my car and drove away while on the phone. i looked in my rearview mirrors but could no longer see the object. attachments: - map of area including points labeled 1, 2, and 3. red circles indicate approximate flight path. - drawing of what i saw at point 2 on map. this is when the object was closest to me and i could make out the triangular shape nearly directly above me. - drawing of what i saw at point 3 on map. this is when the object shone its light at my car. the light was directed at my car and then moved past it as the object passed over me.
